Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated Coyote from 8 to 10.Softer and more control than Tuesday. Tracks are good with a lot of leaves.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were power-tilled and tracked on Tuesday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: The exceptional early season conditions continue today. The temperature should stay just below freezing, making for a comfortable day on the slopes. The snow surface is machine groomed. Pintail Peak opens this Friday. The Big Park opens on Saturday. Lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
